languages.text: "Этот юноша опутан туманом синего и серого. Болезненные тени страха вьются вокруг него". {n}Кассия говорит так тихо, что ее слышите только вы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Этот юноша... он окружен темным туманом. Синие, болезненно серые тени страха и обмана вьются вокруг него".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Этот юноша опутан туманом синего и серого. Болезненные тени страха вьются вокруг него". {n}Кассия говорит так тихо, что ее слышите только вы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. The sickly shadows of fear are flying around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly, that the only one who can hear her is you.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この若者は青灰色の霧に覆い隠されています。恐怖という病の影が、その周りではためいています」{n}カシアはあなたにしか聞こえないように、小声で言う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この若者は青灰色の霧に覆い隠されています。恐怖という病の影が、その周りではためいています」{n}カシアはあなたにしか聞こえないように、小声で言う。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “这个年轻人浑身上下笼罩着灰色与蓝色的薄雾，提心吊胆的恐惧如影随形。”{n}卡西娅以只有你能听到的声音低语道。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个年轻人浑身上下笼罩着灰色与蓝色的薄雾，提心吊胆的恐惧如影随形。”{n}卡西娅以只有你能听到的声音低语道。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Ce jeune homme est enveloppé d'une brume grise et bleue, » {n}chuchote Cassia de manière à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n} « Il est cerné des ombres maladives de la peur. »
languages.original_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce jeune homme est enveloppé d'une brume grise et bleue, » {n}chuchote Cassia de manière à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre.{/n} « Il est cerné des ombres maladives de la peur. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Este joven está envuelto en una neblina gris y azul. Las sombras del miedo revolotean a su alrededor». {n}Cassia susurra de tal manera que solo tú puedes oírla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este joven está envuelto en una neblina gris y azul. Las sombras del miedo revolotean a su alrededor». {n}Cassia susurra de tal manera que solo tú puedes oírla.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Dieser junge Mann ist von einem grau-blauen Nebel umgeben. Die kränklichen Schatten der Furcht flattern um ihn herum." {n}Cassia spricht so leise, dass nur du sie hören kannst.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This young man is shrouded in a mist of grey and blue. Sickly shadows of fear are fluttering around him." {n}Cassia speaks so quietly that only you can hear her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dieser junge Mann ist von einem grau-blauen Nebel umgeben. Die kränklichen Schatten der Furcht flattern um ihn herum." {n}Cassia spricht so leise, dass nur du sie hören kannst.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu genç adamı gri ve mavi dumanlar sarmış. Korkunun gölgesi etrafında tirildiyor." {n}Cassia, öyle kısık bir sesle konuşuyor ki onu ancak sen duyabiliyorsun.{/n}
